title: Bachelor of Science in Middle Grades Education
description: The B.S. in Middle Grades Education is designed to prepare effective teachers for learners in the middle grades (grades 4 through 8) and leads to initial teacher certification in two content areas (language arts, mathematics, science, or social studies) for grades 4-8 in Georgia.
careers: Adult Literacy or High School Equivalency Diploma Teacher, High School Teacher, Instructional Coordinator, Middle School Teacher, Special Education Teacher.
school: Department of Secondary & Middle Grades Education
